actions.medium: Escalate to finance for manual review before BAS lodgment.
actions.high: Freeze discretionary payments and trigger regulator notification runbook.

factors.liquidity_gap: Outstanding obligations are outpacing cash reserves.
factors.open_alerts: Multiple unresolved compliance alerts increase likelihood of a shortfall.
factors.lodgment_gap: Recent BAS lodgments have not fully secured PAYGW/GST balances.
factors.volatility: Cash buffers have swung significantly over the last cycle.
